page.title: 02Interview
page.content: Lord Scarbrough is the 12th Earl.The surname of the family is{Lumley.}They claim to be a Saxon family who moved north after the Battle of Hastings. Lord Scarbrough today has a busy life style with few usual days.Even so he gave us an indication of{events.}After getting up around 7am.he takes a breakfast of two cups of coffee.Only sometimes does he watch Breakfast TV. e.g.this morning to watch USA hostages being released from terrorists,Beirut. On holiday a favourite pastime before lunch would be to do the Times Cross_ word.1pm.is lunch.Generally{meetings} take up many afternoons and evenings. Frank Sinatra,Handel and Military Style is his choice in music.One personal ambition is to win{The Saint {Leger}which is a classic{horserace}run at Doncaster Racecourse.Finally Lord Scarbrough likes to retire before 12pm
